title: Netherlands summer design courses
content:
Hello, this is my first post.

I want to go to a short design course in the Netherlands [short: one-two months, if it's more I don't care] , doesn't have to be about typography, but printed media in general.

After looking for this kind of short courses for several weeks, I feel a little lost. Just couldn't find anything, just master studies.

I have looked at Utrecht school of arts, KABK, ArtEZ, etc. Im looking for something not too formal, want to experiment. There's a school in Barcelona [www.tenemosunplan.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416161051/http:/www.tenemosunplan.com/ "www.tenemosunplan.com") . I'm looking for something like that -lots of practice-

So the question is: Do you know any academy, school, university... offering this kind of courses? [can be anywhere in the Netherlands, small or big institutions, whatever! :)]

Thank you all in advance.
author: urba

comments.content:
Hi

If no one else has an idea, try to contact [www.bno.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416161051/http:/www.bno.nl/ "www.bno.nl")  
A dutch organization for designers.

Or try it with [http://www.graphicdesignmuseum.nl/en/home/4](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416161051/http:/www.graphicdesignmuseum.nl/en/home/4 "http://www.graphicdesignmuseum.nl/en/home/4")

A museum just for graphic design.

Maybe they can help.

Hope this helps.  
Good luck.

Thank you bobbybobo, I did looked for that info in the Breda Museum site and BNO, but I was not sure if they were able to give me that kind of information themselves.

Going ask them and see what happens!

Thank you so much.

You may be interested in looking into the things that are going on with Vide:  
 [http://www.viavide.com/summerexperiences](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416161051/http:/www.viavide.com/summerexperiences)

Thank You andyclymer! That's exactly what I'm looking for.

If you know more similar options, feel free to post :)

those projects look really nice!  
thank you typovar.

I study graphic design at the KABK in the Hague. For type this is the place to go. KABK is the only school that has a post graduate course in type called "type and media". If you have any questions feel free to contact me.
